sentences: Kasvit saavat ravinteita juurten kautta ja ilmaa lehtien kautta kuoren läpi.
context: In Finnish, 'kuori' refers to the outer covering or shell of various objects. Most commonly it means the peel or skin of fruits and vegetables (like apple peels), but it can also refer to tree bark, the rind of cheese, or other protective outer layers on plants and animals.
